Articles.Content:
The idea of this signature is very simple, it tells which celestial bodies you have visited successfully. The file contains the base signature (with kerbin, arrows, mun and minmus lit up) and every celestial body (lit up) as individual .png files, so you can create your own signature by adding all the celestial bodies you have visited as layers on top of the base signature.

For example with Gimp you open up the base.png --> file --> open as layer and select all the celestial bodies you want to add

--> save the image.

Here is the base signature:

...And the complete signature:

DOWNLOAD FILE
can you remove the lights for the noobs who cant land on the mun and minmus lol?

Here's my own version, inspired by the Pioneer plaques:

If there's interest, I can try my hand at converting them to a series of image masks like the original poster; or, if someone who knows more about doing that wants to, please go right ahead.

That's definitely nifty, except for one thing...I haven't been to Minmus yet (otherwise I'd slap that puppy in my sig right now). Could you possibly make the base image have no lights at all, and then include lit Mun, Minmus, and orbit panels?

That's definitely nifty, except for one thing...I haven't been to Minmus yet (otherwise I'd slap that puppy in my sig right now). Could you possibly make the base image have no lights at all, and then include lit Mun, Minmus, and orbit panels?

Well, maybe you just should head out for Minmus instead?

Well, maybe you just should head out for Minmus instead?

O.o That's a rather snide remark. It doesn't help anyone to be like that toward newbies.

Nice.

Perhaps the visited planets could be a bit brighter so the difference between visited and unvisited gets clearer.

A suggestion I'd like to see someone do with this signature is have a couple more indicators. Like the red and blue arrow but for each point of interest. Basically one that says you landed on said thing and the other arrow that says you made it back from said thing safely.
Not only a cool artwork, Makettaja, but a nice merchandise idea! Squad should make these "dice" and sell them - well, in this case the moons should be reproduced too, not just the planets.

Here's my own version, inspired by the Pioneer plaques:

If there's interest, I can try my hand at converting them to a series of image masks like the original poster; or, if someone who knows more about doing that wants to, please go right ahead.

I made masks and stuff. PSD file included in the archive along with PNG masks like the OP signature.

Yay, signature, in link form. For linking.

This thing has inspired me to make one of my own. With lots of arrows and indicators and stuff. (Still sketching where things will go at this point, so don't expect anything soon.)

Edited September 29, 2012 by phoenix_ca
I can't figure out how to layer these, help..
Try this? Seems to support layers.
Never really interested in having a signature until I seen this. Great job.
Thanks! What I did was crop out the planets and moons I didn't go to with Microsoft Paint. So its Kerbin, Mun, Minmus. Good idea?
Eee! Thank you so much! And yours looks great (okay, amazing)!
